title.native: BAKUMATSU ~恋愛幕末カレシ 外伝~

description:
The Bakumatsu was an era in which the souls of young men burned with anxiety for their country's future. Takasugi Shinsaku, a soldier of fortune from Choshu, sneaks aboard a government ship with his comrade Katsura Kogorou in search of a mysterious "timepiece" with the power to manipulate time that he fears the government wishes to keep for themselves. Rather than allow such power to fall into the wrong hands, Takasugi plans to destroy the artifact, but having obtained it, the artifact is quickly stolen, forcing the pair to follow the mysterious thief to the seat of government in Kyoto. However, when they arrive in the capital, they discover that the government has been overthrown and the deity Susanoo now reigns in its place. The streets of the city and the people in them are much different than Takasugi and Katsura remembered. The times may have changed but their mission hasn't - Takasugi and Katsura resolve to reset time and save their nation from the nefarious forces trying to hijack it.

(Source: Tokyo Otaku Mode)

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/saifu1low)

Masahiro Yokotani does series composition and scriptwriting.

Fujino Sadayoshi is a sound director working for Cruise. He has mostly worked on anime shows produced by Sunrise and Nippon Animation. He was married to actress and voice actress [Fujii Kayoko](https://anilist.co/staff/105105/Kayoko-Fujii).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/saifu1low)

Masahiro Yokotani does series composition and scriptwriting.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yamayama800) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/山口宏_(脚本家%29)

He's Japanese screenwriter and novelist, and one of the founders of Studio [Gonzo](https://anilist.co/studio/3/GONZO).

[Website](https://music.mages.co.jp/mikoto/index.html) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/mikoto-ryosuke/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/MIKOTO-Ryosuke-426929194116397/)

MIKOTO is a Japanese solo project of singer-songwriter, guitarist and lyricist Ryousuke.

Formerly a music composition unit made up of three members, MIKOTO became a solo endeavor in 2014 after the departure of MEG.ME and Shin'ya.

__[Website](https://erisasaki.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/eri_lattice)__

__Eri Sasaki__ is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist and composer, who is signed to 5pb. Records and Sony Music Publishing. She made her music debut in 2015 with the release of her first single "Ring of Fortune", which is used as the opening theme to the anime television series Plastic Memories. She released her first album in 2017.

(Source: [Eri Sasaki's Official Website](https://erisasaki.net/profile), edited)
_Note: Not to be confused with the [producer](https://anilist.co/staff/152630/)._
